name: Flip Baseball: official MLBPA card game
name_original: Flip Baseball: official MLBPA card game
description:
From the creators of Baseball General Manager, we present to you… Flip Baseball, one of the best baseball strategy games in the world for mobile devices in which you can play free games in real time against other baseball fans.

Get your team ready for action and enjoy baseball like never before! The gameplay is very different from the other games in this category as it’s a very unique game. It’s easy to play but hard to perfect.

GAME STRATEGY
In Flip Baseball, each card has its own set of skill points - for offense and defense. You must decide how to use them in each moment in order to win the throw-down and come out with the win.

CREATE A WELL-ROUNDED LINEUP
Create a powerful lineup, throw down your best cards and flip those of your opponents. The more flips you can make, the higher the chances you have of winning. In addition, you’ll have to even out your roster in order to play with a balanced lineup. That way you’ll have a higher chance of using your best cards in each game.

COLLECT 300 PLAYERS
If you can use your top skills, you’ll win a lot of games and, the more you win, the more packs you can get. Eventually you’ll be able to collect the best players like Scherzer, Kershaw, Bumgarner, Trout, Pujols and 300 other baseball superstars.

MULTIPLAYER - 1 ON 1 and TOURNAMENTS
Play against thousands of users in league or tournaments games, all or nothing, and prove you have what it takes to lead the best team.

Are you ready to enjoy the best baseball strategy card game in the world for free?

Download Flip Baseball now!

This game requires internet connection.
If you like it, “Like” it - http://facebook.com/flipbaseball

www.playflipbaseball.com

Support and suggestions: https://fromthebench.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

To be able to play this application you will need internet connection. This application offers integrated purchases. You can disactivate them in your device settings.
Visit our forum at www.fromthebenchgames.com/forums/ to meet other players and to stay up to date on the game.

This application needs you to accept the "Privacy Policy" and the "Legal Notice". It contains advertisements of "From The Bench, SL" and of their partners, includes advertisements inside the game, reunites data through analysis technology and the delivery of third party advertisements including the location based in the network and GPS. It also contains direct links to social networks for those older than 13 years of age as well as direct links to the Internet.
